forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming windy. Cloudy skies with periods of rain developing this afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early then becoming windy with periods of rain this afternoon. High 53F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low around 5C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 42F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
